last_episode_to_air.name: Maintain This Temperature and Stay by My Side
last_episode_to_air.overview: Jin-ju sits down to write satisfying endings for her characters. Likewise, her friends and family find closure and welcome new adventures.

name: Be Melodramatic
overview: At the start of their 30s, three friends navigate the demanding entertainment industry while juggling love, careers and dreams.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: At the start of their thirties, three friends navigate the demanding entertainment industry while juggling love, careers and dreams.

episodes.name: I'm Not Going to Like Something Like Love
episodes.overview: Im Jin-ju and her two friends, Lee Eun-jeong and Hwang Han-ju, recount the events that knitted them together into a makeshift family.

episodes.name: If He's a Director, Shouldn't He Have a Girlfriend? The Thing is He Has No Luck^^
episodes.overview: A new man enters Han-ju's life, while a fried chicken emergency keeps her on high alert. Jin-ju takes an enlightening tour of JBC Station.

episodes.name: Are You on the Side of the Man I Like?
episodes.overview: Son Beom-su and Jin-ju strike an exciting deal, Eun-jeong starts a new gig, and Han-ju no longer has to hustle alone.

episodes.name: Are You Going to Transfer? What a Philanthropist!
episodes.overview: A booze-filled night causes Beom-su's and Jin-ju's lives to tangle, while a potential subject for a new documentary piques Eun-jeong's interest.

episodes.name: It's Not Going to Be Easy, But It's Going to Be a Lot of Fun. Good Luck to Us
episodes.overview: Jin-ju and her friends set off to party but settle on a great new restaurant instead. Beom-su prepares to convince JBC to pick up their new series.

episodes.name: You're Growing on Me. You're Growing on Me...
episodes.overview: In the face of a major crisis, Jin-ju reacts by sitting perfectly still while Han-ju confronts it head-on ... by giving them exactly what they want.

episodes.name: Can I Kiss You? Only Kiss!
episodes.overview: Every love story begins with a confession -- which, as it turns out, is hard to write. As Jin-ju overcomes her writer's block, Beom-su develops a crush.

episodes.name: I Don't Know How I Used to Be...
episodes.overview: Jin-ju and Beom-su debate a choice between two production companies. Han-ju and Chu Jae-hun's dinner is interrupted by an unwelcome visitor.

episodes.name: Why Are You Hesitating, Are You Excited, By Any Chance?
episodes.overview: Beom-su grows anxious as an eager young co-worker hijacks his production staff. Eun-jeong becomes increasingly aware of Hong-dae's absence.

episodes.name: Is Something Making You Jealous?
episodes.overview: Jin-ju's past and present come to light as gossip spreads rapidly among writers. A foulmouthed director tries Eun-jeong's patience.

episodes.name: There's Something I Need to Figure Out... My Heart That Likes the Writer
episodes.overview: Rumors create a rift in Beom-su and Jin-ju's relationship. Eun-jeong's brother, Lee Hyo-bong, advises her to seek treatment.

episodes.name: Love Is The Best Thing In The World
episodes.overview: Beom-su confesses his feelings, but it unwittingly turns into a heated debate. Eun-jeong's vision of Hong-dae takes a violent turn.

episodes.name: Why Are You Getting Out of There...?
episodes.overview: A mortifying incident puts a strain on one relationship but brings another closer together. Meanwhile, the production moves forward, although bumpily.

episodes.name: Do You Want Me to Hug You? It's Hard For You...
episodes.overview: Beom-su, Jin-ju, Han-ju and Jae-hun take a short trip to cool off. Eun-jeong heads to an orphanage, where she meets a fellow patron.

episodes.name: Today I Should Be a Little Disappointed
episodes.overview: When an accident moves up the production schedule by several months, Beom-su gets pulled into endless meetings, causing Jin-ju to grow upset.

episodes.name: Maintain This Temperature and Stay by My Side
episodes.overview: Jin-ju sits down to write satisfying endings for her characters. Likewise, her friends and family find closure and welcome new adventures.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: At the start of their thirties, three friends navigate the demanding entertainment industry while juggling love, careers and dreams.
